traits.name: Pounce
entries: If the deinonychus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the deinonychus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The deinonychus makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) slashing damage.
